Is Botswana a diamond-producing country? Botswana diamond production

All diamond mining in Botswana operates under a licensing agreement with the government in which 80 percent of diamond-related revenues are put back into the country's economy. Today, Botswana is now the world's number one diamond-producing country by value.
Is Botswana a diamond-producing country? Botswana diamond production
